name: TorroFactory
description: Factory for creation of DAOs and their governing tokens. Contract for creation of DAOs and their governing tokens, and handling benefits withdrawal for all available DAO pools.

eventDecorators.name: ClaimBenefits
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a vehicle is removed.

eventDecorators.name: PoolCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a vehicle is removed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: benefits amount to be added to holder's existing benefits.

functionDecorators.name: benefitsOf
functionDecorators.description: Checks available benefits of an address.

functionDecorators.name: create
functionDecorators.description: Creates a cloned DAO and governing token.

parameterDecorators.name: maxCost_
parameterDecorators.description: maximum cost of all governing tokens for created DAO.

parameterDecorators.name: executeMinPct_
parameterDecorators.description: minimum percentage of votes needed for proposal execution.

parameterDecorators.name: votingMinHours_
parameterDecorators.description: minimum lifetime of proposal before it closes.

parameterDecorators.name: hasAdmins_
parameterDecorators.description: whether DAO has admins or all holders should be treated as admins.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: governing token for DAO that's depositing benefits.

functionDecorators.name: isDao
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether provided address is a valid DAO.

returnDecorators.description: bool true if address is a valid DAO.

functionDecorators.name: migrate
functionDecorators.description: Creates clone of main DAO and migrates an existing DAO to it.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: Governing token that needs to migrate to new dao.

functionDecorators.name: poolDao
functionDecorators.description: Gets DAO address for governing token.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: token address to get DAO address for.

functionDecorators.name: poolTokens
functionDecorators.description: All governing tokens created via factory.

functionDecorators.name: poolTokensForHolder
functionDecorators.description: Gets addresses of governing tokens that are visible to holder.

parameterDecorators.name: holder_
parameterDecorators.description: holder address to get available tokens for.

returnDecorators.description: array of token addresses that holder owns or can buy.

functionDecorators.name: price
functionDecorators.description: Gets current price for DAO creation.

functionDecorators.name: setMinMaxCost
functionDecorators.description: Sets minimal maximum cost for new DAO creation.

parameterDecorators.name: cost_
parameterDecorators.description: minimal maximum cost of new DAO.

functionDecorators.name: setNewDao
functionDecorators.description: Sets address of new Main DAO.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of Torro Factory to new owner.
